upload-passport-image.header: Upload a copy of your passport

example.title: Example image
example.content: The image must be of the page showing your photo, name and other personal information.

requirements.title: Image requirements
requirements.item-1: whole page and no other objects
requirements.item-3: no flash, shadows, creases or tears
requirements.item-4: JPG, JPEG or PNG format only

check-passport-image.passport-image-alt-text: The image of your passport that you uploaded in the previous step.

checklist.title: Check that:
checklist.item-2: you can read all the information
checklist.item-3: there are no flashes, shadows, creases or tears

complete.title: We have received your passport image
complete.title-block-h1: We have received your passport image

content.what-happens-next-p1: We will now check your passport image before we issue your electronic visa waiver - this can take up to 24 hours.
content.what-happens-next-p2: We will email {{email}} within 24 hours with details of how to download it.
content.what-happens-next-p3: Please add electronicvisawaiver@homeoffice.gov.uk to your safe senders list to make sure you get your download details. You should wait 24 hours before contacting us about your EVW
